author: joeyaiello
body:
I was a little bothered by the '2k' in the filenames for alpha.15, so I went and changed them to use the full years. We were only saving one character (and only for 2008), and I believe this improves readability. 

/cc @raghushantha

comments.author: HemantMahawar
comments.body: LGTM. 1 extra character to keep @joeyaiello happy is nothing ;)

title: Change '2k' years in build script
